verses.verse: And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> concerning the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5087>vow<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H7650>swear<s%> an <S%H7621>oath<s%> to <S%H631>bind<s%> <S%H5921><s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> with a <S%H632>bond;<s%> he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2490>break<s%> his <S%H1697>word,<s%> he shall <S%H6213>do<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that proceedeth <S%H3318>out<s%> of his <S%H4480>mouth.<s%> <S%H6310><s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> also <S%H5087>vow<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H631>bind<s%> herself by a <S%H632>bond,<s%> being in her <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> in her <S%H5271>youth;<s%>

And her <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H5088>vow,<s%> and her <S%H632>bond<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> she hath <S%H631>bound<s%> <S%H5921><s%> her <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and her <S%H1>father<s%> shall hold his <S%H2790>peace<s%> at her: then <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H5088>vows<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H632>bond<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> she hath <S%H631>bound<s%> <S%H5921><s%> her <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> her <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H5106>disallow<s%> her in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H8085>heareth;<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> of her <S%H5088>vows,<s%> or of her <S%H632>bonds<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> she hath <S%H631>bound<s%> <S%H5921><s%> her <S%H5315>soul,<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5545>forgive<s%> her, <S%H3588>because<s%> her <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H5106>disallowed<s%> her.

And <S%H518>if<s%> she had at <S%H1961>all<s%> <S%H1961><s%> a <S%H376>husband,<s%> when she <S%H5088>vowed,<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H4008>uttered<s%> aught out of her <S%H8193>lips,<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> she <S%H631>bound<s%> <S%H5921><s%> her <S%H5315>soul;<s%>

And her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> it, and held his <S%H2790>peace<s%> at her in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H8085>heard<s%> it: then her <S%H5088>vows<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand,<s%> and her <S%H632>bonds<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> she <S%H631>bound<s%> <S%H5921><s%> her <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H5106>disallowed<s%> her on the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H8085>heard<s%> it; then he shall <S%H853>make<s%> her <S%H5088>vow<s%> which she <S%H834>vowed,<s%> <S%H5921><s%> and that which she <S%H4008>uttered<s%> with her <S%H8193>lips,<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> she <S%H631>bound<s%> <S%H5921><s%> her <S%H5315>soul,<s%> of none <S%H6565>effect:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5545>forgive<s%> her.

But <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5088>vow<s%> of a <S%H490>widow,<s%> and of her that is <S%H1644>divorced,<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> they have <S%H631>bound<s%> <S%H5921><s%> their <S%H5315>souls,<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> her.

And <S%H518>if<s%> she <S%H5087>vowed<s%> in her <S%H376>husband's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H631>bound<s%> <S%H5921><s%> her <S%H5315>soul<s%> by a <S%H632>bond<s%> with an <S%H7621>oath;<s%>

And her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> it, and held his <S%H2790>peace<s%> at her, and <S%H5106>disallowed<s%> her <S%H3808>not:<s%> then <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H5088>vows<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H632>bond<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> she <S%H631>bound<s%> <S%H5921><s%> her <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> hath utterly made them <S%H6565>void<s%> <S%H6565><s%> <S%H853><s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> he <S%H8085>heard<s%> them; then <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> proceeded <S%H4161>out<s%> of her <S%H8193>lips<s%> concerning her <S%H5088>vows,<s%> or concerning the <S%H632>bond<s%> of her <S%H5315>soul,<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6965>stand:<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> hath made them <S%H6565>void;<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5545>forgive<s%> her.

Every <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5088>vow,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H632>binding<s%> <S%H7621>oath<s%> to <S%H6031>afflict<s%> the <S%H5315>soul,<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> may <S%H6965>establish<s%> it, or her <S%H376>husband<s%> may make it <S%H6565>void.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> altogether hold his <S%H2790>peace<s%> <S%H2790><s%> at her from <S%H4480>day<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> then he <S%H6965>establisheth<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H5088>vows,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H632>bonds,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H5921>upon<s%> her: he <S%H6965>confirmeth<s%> them, <S%H3588>because<s%> he held his <S%H2790>peace<s%> at her in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H8085>heard<s%> them.

But <S%H518>if<s%> he shall any ways make them <S%H6565>void<s%> <S%H6565><s%> <S%H853><s%> after <S%H310>that<s%> he hath <S%H8085>heard<s%> them; then he shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> being yet in her <S%H5271>youth<s%> in her <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>
